{
  "triples": [
    {"s":"US Transducer Array", "p":"uses", "o":"piezoelectric elements", "modalities":["text","image"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"In most modern ultrasound systems, the transducers are not just a single piezoelectric element like we saw earlier — they’re made up of arrays of elements, either one-dimensional or two-dimensional."},
    {"s":"US Transducer Array", "p":"uses", "o":"electrodes", "modalities":["text","image"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"Beneath these elements, we have the electrodes, which are used to apply oscillating sinusoidal electrical signals."},
    {"s":"US Transducer Array", "p":"uses", "o":"matching layers", "modalities":["text","image"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"Above these piezo elements, you can see matching layers — sometimes there are two, a first and a second matching layer."},
    {"s":"US Transducer Array", "p":"uses", "o":"custom-designed flexible circuit", "modalities":["text","image"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence

evidence: Above these piezo elements, you can see matching layers - sometimes there are two, a first and a second matching layer.
